title: Investigate noDisc optimization for spanning_tree when lb == ub
description:
SMT-RAT does noDisc for leaves connected to the section-defining polynomial in the section case. This might extend to sector spanning_tree mode when lb and ub are the same polynomial.

The previous implementation was unsound because it applied to general leaves connected to any boundary, but discriminants are needed to ensure a polynomial's own roots don't merge/split.

Investigate whether this optimization is valid when lb == ub (same polynomial defines both bounds).

title: Use commas instead of parentheses in comments

description:
